CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing GeoNuts relative to Solara Sugarbeet?
SRP.A: GeoNuts is {below} Solara Sugarbeet in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Solara Sugarbeet relative to GeoNuts?
SRP.A: Solara Sugarbeet is {above} GeoNuts in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {GeoNuts}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total fertilizer price?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Solara Sugarbeet}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Solara Sugarbeet's maximum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Solara Sugarbeet's maximum Fertilizer Price is in {1984}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Solara Sugarbeet's minimum Fertilizer Price in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Solara Sugarbeet's minimum Fertilizer Price is in {2008}.

NC.Q: Between 1995 and 2009, was the average total Fertilizer Price higher or lower than between 1993 and 2011?
NC.A: The average total fertilizer price between 1995 and 2009 was {higher} than between 1993 and 2011.

NC.Q: Between 1991 and 2000, did the total Fertilizer Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 1990 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total fertilizer price between 1991 and 2000 was {smaller} than between 1990 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1992 and 2003, was the average total Fertilizer Price higher or lower than between 1983 and 2000?
NC.A: The average total fertilizer price between 1992 and 2003 was {lower} than between 1983 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1999 and 2009, did the total Fertilizer Price experience a larger or smaller change than between 2000 and 2005?
NC.A: The change in total fertilizer price between 1999 and 2009 was {smaller} than between 2000 and 2005.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {GeoNuts} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Solara Sugarbeet and GeoNuts first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Solara Sugarbeet and GeoNuts first exchanged leading positions in {1990}.
